attributes.action: Protect british citizens, Legalise and Control the sale of Cannabis
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I call for Mr Brown to Protect british citizens from contamination, criminal gangs and imprisonment, by legalising cannabis and controlling its supply.
Prohibition has done nothing but harm and forced the supply into the hands of criminals that put profit over safety. Please stop the Hypocrisy, Legalise, Regulate, and Tax the supply of cannabis, in the same way as tobacco and alcohol. Only this will protect the young and vulnerable, and help treat the medical patients that so badly need its benefits. Please, Its just a plant...

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
